hymn.title: God's Spirit His transmission is
hymn.category: Experience of God—By the Spirit as the Transmission

layout.singingstanza: God's Spir -- it His trans -- mis -- sion is, In Him God en -- ters in -- to us; It is in Him that God in Christ May be ex -- pe -- ri -- enced by us.

lyrics.stanza: God's Spirit His transmission is, In Him God enters into us; It is in Him that God in Christ May be experienced by us.
God as the Father is the source, And God the Son doth Him express; God as the Spirit enters us, That God as all we may possess.
The Father, who is veiled in light, The Son to man hath fully shown; The Spirit then transmitteth Him That He may inwardly be known.
The Son within the Father is, And now the Spirit is the Son. The Spirit, Son, and Father God Are now in us and with us one.
God as the Father in the Son Has been embodied and expressed, And God the Spirit is the Son's Reality to be possessed.
May God the Father's love to us In God the Son as grace be known, Thru God the Spirit's fellowship, That God our portion we may own.
